description: An easy delicious recipe that is perfect with a cuppa.
name: Chocolate Coconut Fudge Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat fan force oven to 170Â°C.Gather ingredients and sift flour and cocoa into a bowl
Add all other dry ingredients and mix together.
Add the eggs and butter and fold together until all ingredients are well combined.
Press into a slab tin and bake for 30 mins.

Remove from oven and ice while hot. Chocolate Icing: 2 tbsp cocoa powder, 1 1/2 cups soft icing mixture, 1 dspn melted butter, 1/4 cup hot water. Mix altogether and spread onto fudge and sprinkle with coconut.
Leave in the tin until cold and then slice into pieces.
